The point that I'm making is that neither one of us had the time but we found the time because we knew the value and the potential reward behind the meeting.

For example....I'm shooting a movie at the moment & I wanted to meet with someone of importance. I asked them if they wanted to make this meeting a priority and they replied yes....so they flew to me and we met at 6:30am for 2hrs before I went to work.
Things that make me laugh....When I hear people say that they don't have time....We have time people...the real question is are you willing to make time? That's the real question....
